title: Honoring Karen Sarandis upon the occasion of her designation as recipient of the Registered Nurse of the Year Award
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION honoring Karen Sarandis upon the occasion of her
designation as recipient of the Registered Nurse of the  Year  Award  by
the New York State Health Facilities Association

WHEREAS,  It is the custom of this Legislative Body to recognize and pay
tribute to those nurses from this great Empire State  who  have  distin-
guished  themselves through professional excellence and made significant
contributions to the quality of life of its citizenry; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing  traditions,  this  Legislative  Body  is justly proud to honor
Karen Sarandis upon the occasion of her designation as recipient of  the
Registered  Nurse of the Year Award by the New York State Health Facili-
ties Association; and
  WHEREAS, For the past 17 years,  Karen  Sarandis  has  worked  at  the
Vestal  Nursing  Center, most recently as Assistant Director of Nursing;
and
  WHEREAS, Karen Sarandis has earned the respect and admiration  of  her
fellow employees with her dedication to providing quality health care to
the residents; throughout the entire period of her distinguished career,
she has stood constant in dignity, good grace and humor; and
  WHEREAS, Rare indeed is the impressive dedication shown by individuals
for  the benefit of others which Karen Sarandis has displayed throughout
her life; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body that  when  individ-
uals  of  such  noble aims and accomplishments are brought to our atten-
tion, they should be celebrated and recognized by all  the  citizens  of
the great State of New York; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
honor Karen Sarandis upon the occasion of her designation  as  recipient
of  the  Registered Nurse of the Year Award by the New York State Health
Facilities Association; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Karen Sarandis, Vestal, New York.
